snippet: An article on Donald J. Trump’s behavior toward women had readers debating workplace ethics, claims of sexism and when, exactly, a man crosses a line with a woman.
lead_paragraph: An article on Donald J. Trump’s behavior toward women had readers debating workplace ethics, claims of sexism and when, exactly, a man crosses a line with a woman.

headline.main: ‘I Need a Shower After Reading This’: Readers on Trump’s Conduct With Women
headline.print_headline: Readers’ Views On Trump Behavior Toward Women
